suppress.notes: The problem is described here: https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2015-5237 Google maintain it's fixed from 3.4 onwards: https://github.com/google/protobuf/issues/760

The problem is described here: https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2017-17485#VulnChangeHistoryDiv The jackson-databind devs discuss it here: https://github.com/FasterXML/jackson-databind/issues/1904 Recommended reading is here: https://medium.com/@cowtowncoder/on-jackson-cves-dont-panic-here-is-what-you-need-to-know-54cd0d6e8062 Our conclusion is in API-360 There is now an additional CVE, seemingly for the same issue: https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2018-5968
